name: Farm & Zoo Angry Animals Transporter Truck Driving
name_original: Farm & Zoo Angry Animals Transporter Truck Driving
description:
Farm & Zoo Angry Animals Transporter Truck Driving is one of the best animal transport simulator that is going to be a complete treat for farmland zoo animals transport games lovers. So get ready for playing Farm & Zoo Angry Animals Transporter Truck Driving game which is all about transporting domestic farm animals as well as wild zoo animals. Animal transporter games were never such fun before.

Get behind the wheel of the transporter truck and transport animals like elephant, cow, fish and chicken to destination. You will be tested on parking skills of a transporter trailer truck as well as other types of trucks transporting animals. As the driver of the transporter truck in this truck simulator game, park the truck carefully so that the farm animals can be loaded and unloaded easily. Driving the transport truck is an even bigger challenge where you have to make sure you follow the traffic rules and drive on the city roads carefully.

In some cases, you need to guide and load animals in the transporter truck from different locations and then transport and deliver them to the destinations. While moving animals, you must transport them in a way that won’t cause them injuries. You have to move the heavy duty cattle transporter truck to its target with precision and accuracy.

Farm & Zoo Angry Animals Transporter Truck Driving Game Features:
+ Transport Different Animals in Challenging Levels
+ An Awesome Real Heavy Truck Driving Experience
+ Game Center Leaderboard and Achievements
+ Classic Gameplay of Cargo Truck Transportation Game
+ Realistic Village and City Environment
+ A Good Experience of Live Animals Transport
+ Extreme & Real 3D Animal Transportation Simulator
+ Smooth Controls and Awesome 3D Sounds
